original_text: People of Tarshish, now you will have to grow your own crops. Grow them like they do beside the Nile river. Traders no longer come to Tyre to sell their things.
korean_text: 딸 다시스여 나일 같이 너희 땅에 넘칠지어다 너를 속박함이 다시는 없으리라

sentences.original_text: People of Tarshish, now you will have to grow your own crops.
sentences.korean_translation: 다르십 사람들아, 이제 너희는 자기 곡식을 스스로 길러야 할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Grow them like they do beside the Nile river.
Traders no longer come to Tyre to sell their things.
sentences.korean_translation: 상인들은 더 이상 물건을 팔려고 두로로 오지 않는다.
